properties.entry: SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectAllNoticeList(); */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC

INSERT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#insertNotice(); */ INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

UPDATE /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#incrementNoticeCount(); */ TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_COUNT FROM TBL_NOTICE B WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#seletNoticeDetail(); */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_BODY = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
